string-array.item: Enjoy the fruits of your labor.
Androids are known to be fast, but not as fast as you!
Let\'s do the time warp again.
Just a jump to the left.
You have a palette for haste.

resources.string: While traveling in an area where the time is different, add a clock for home
Stopwatch service to run the notification.
Swipe left to snooze or right to dismiss
